These vertical bars are also silver and have a subtle, elegant curve at their top edges, adding to the overall aesthetic appeal.

The car is positioned at a slight angle, highlighting its elegant and sophisticated design. The vehicle's body is sleek, with smooth lines and a low profile, emphasizing its grandeur and opulence. The convertible top, though not fully deployed in the image, is visible and matches the car's body color, suggesting a seamless integration into the overall design.

The grille includes two vertical bars on either side, adding to its intricate design.
